Security settings
Setting Value Description
bs.security
Tell BlobServer whether to check security before allowing database access and image retrieval.
If security is on, images can not be cached in memory.
cc.security
Tell ContentServer whether to check security before allowing database access.
secure.CatalogManager
Tell CatalogManager whether DefaultReader can connect to the specified servlet when security is on; true means DefaultReader can NOT connect.
secure.DebugServer
Tell DebugServer whether DefaultReader can connect to the specified servlet when security is on; true means DefaultReader can NOT connect.
secure.TreeManager
Tell TreeManager whether DefaultReader can connect to the specified servlet when security is on; true means DefaultReader can NOT connect.
cs.wrapper
Disable this for installations where HTTP is not available for use in constructing html wrapper pages.
It is strongly recommended for both development, production and live environments that security is turned on.
From the internet only access to ContentServer, BlobServer, Satellite and CookieServer should be allowed.
